extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    SPAN251 or SPAN351 or SPAN352.
Corequisite     (SPAN301 and SPAN302) or (SPAN 303 and SPAN 304).

basic.description: A survey of women's literary and cultural production in Latin America from the earliest writers to the present day. Texts will include poetry, essays, short stories, novels, art and film.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Cultura femenina latinoamericana
